title: A Fortunate Complication
description: In the second book of the Everywoman series, Agnes flies to South Korea to take a breather from her life in London. Away from her husband Benedict and her lover Michael to gain perspective on her life, she meets Lee, a young widower, who surprisingly takes her on a steamy affair that makes her question her feelings about the men in her life. To complicate matters, both Benedict and Michael fly to South Korea to convince her to be with either of them. Meanwhile, Lee asks her if she could stay longer in South Korea and be with him. Who wins and who loses in this new complication in Agnes' life? Is it possible to love different men with varying degrees of passion at the same time? A story about love and lust, about relationships, romance, and infidelity, A Fortunate Complication continues where the first book, A Lovely Dilemma, ends, finding Agnes in a new country, but with her old life haunting its way back to her.
author: Aischa Zorindell
